gpxCompare.title: GPX File Comparison
gpxCompare.description: Upload two GPX files to compare running routes and generate a visualization.
gpxCompare.dragDrop: or drag and drop a .gpx file here

errors.networkError: Network connection lost. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.timeoutError: The request took too long to complete. Please try again with smaller files or check your connection.

warnings.filesUploaded: You have uploaded files that will be lost if you navigate away. Are you sure you want to leave?
warnings.processingInProgress: Route comparison is currently being processed. Leaving now will cancel the operation. Are you sure?
warnings.tabSwitch: You have uploaded files in the GPX Compare tool. Switching tabs will lose your progress. Continue?

gpxCompare.interpolationDescription: Average distance between interpolated track points. Lower values provide more detailed analysis but require more processing time.
gpxCompare.thresholdDescription: Maximum distance between routes to be considered similar. Points farther apart than this threshold will be marked as significant differences.

placeholderTool.comingSoon: This tool is coming soon! It will provide additional functionality for runners.
placeholderTool.developmentMessage: This feature is currently being developed and will be available soon.
placeholderTool.checkBack: Check back later for exciting new running tools!

instructions.step1: Click "Start Planning" to begin creating your route
instructions.step2: {{action}} anywhere to add new waypoints at the end
instructions.step3: {{action}} anywhere to insert new points between adjacent points
instructions.step6: Export your route as a GPX file when finished
instructions.touchTap: Tap: Add waypoint or select marker
instructions.touchLongPressMap: Long-press map: Insert point between adjacent points

messages.clickToAddWaypoints: Click to add waypoints. Ctrl/Cmd + Click to insert points between adjacent points. Right-click markers to delete them.
messages.startPlanningToBegin: Start planning to begin adding waypoints to your route
messages.addPointsForElevation: Add at least 2 points to your route to see the elevation profile
messages.addWaypointsForEstimates: Add waypoints to your route to see estimated running times and calorie burn
messages.elevationDataSource: Elevation data is fetched from the Open Elevation API.
messages.mockDataNote: Note: This elevation profile uses mock data for demonstration purposes. In a real application, you would fetch actual elevation data from a service like Open Elevation API or Google Elevation API.

confirmations.clearRouteConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear the entire route? This action cannot be undone.
confirmations.tabSwitchWarning: You have a route in progress. Switching tabs will lose your route. Continue?

errors.gpxParseError: Error parsing GPX file. Please ensure it's a valid GPX file.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum file size is 3MB.

accessibility.waypointTooltip: Waypoint {{index}} - Right-click to delete, drag to move
